price: 18. Les mosquées sont à Allah Seul ; n’y invoquez donc personne avec Lui.
arabic: وَأَنَّ ٱلۡمَسَٰجِدَ لِلَّهِ فَلَا تَدۡعُواْ مَعَ ٱللَّهِ أَحَدٗا

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: wa-anna al-masājida lillahi falā tadʿū maʿa al-lahi aḥadan
